hanzi-su-wiki:
描

Значения

Рисовать, чертить, обрисовывать

Мнемоника

Изображать руками 扌 знаки, похожие на молодую траву 苗 или «травяные», скорописные иероглифы.
purpleculture_pinyin:
miáo
to depict; to trace (a drawing); to copy; to touch up
изображать; трассировать (рисунок); копировать; подправить
rtega_mnemonic:
描描RScopy, trace, sketch, depict
  • hand 扌 of a painter drawing traces depicting a landscape with fields and plants 苗 to make a sketch
purpleculture_info: Pictophonetic: 苗 indicates the sound; 扌 (hand) conveys the meaning.
purpleculture_examples:
描写 [ miáo xiě ]: to describe; to depict; to portray; description
描述 [ miáo shù ]: to describe; description
描绘 [ miáo huì ]: to describe; to portray
扫描 [ sǎo miáo ]: to scan
素描 [ sù miáo ]: sketch
purpleculture_tree:
• ⿰ Left to right
    • 扌 [ shǒu ] hand
    • 苗 [ miáo ] sprouts; Miao nationality
heisig_chinese_memo: To describe something, like the growth process of a seedling, use your fingers to sketch something on a white board or even in the sand.
heisig_constituent: sketch, finger, fingers, seedlings, flowers, rice field, brains
koohiiStory1: A sketch is a seedling (#234) of things to come. Before the assault, the sergeant draws a sketch of the attack with his fingers in the sand.
koohiiStory2: I´m bad at drawing, so when I try to sketch the kanji for cat, you can sort of recognize it, but I don´t get the curve of the "wild dogs" just right.
jp_example_words:
描写(びょうしゃ): depiction, description, portrayal
描く(えがく): draw, paint, sketch, depict, describe
WaniKani_Meaning_Mnemonic: When you see flowers in a rice paddy you can't help but use your fingers to draw them. Have you ever seen rice paddy flowers? They're beautiful. And if you can draw them you can capture that beauty and show it to everyone.
WaniKani_Meaning_Info: Imagine using your fingers to draw these rice paddy flowers. Don't worry about how well you can draw, this is so beautiful, anyone could capture it.
WaniKani_Reading_Mnemonic: Even though you tried to draw the flowers as best you could, whenever someone looks at it they smell B.O. (びょう). Maybe it's because you were drawing for a really long time and kept sweating. Maybe it's because you are just a stinky person. But no one wants to look at your drawing for long because all they can smell is B.O.
WaniKani_Reading_Info: To be fair, would you want to look at a drawing that makes you constantly smell stinky B.O.? I didn't think so.
Ru_trainchinese: miáo: (глаг) копировать, срисовывать; подводить, подрисовывать
Kanshudo_mnemonic: the seedling (苗) from your hand (扌) is a drawing
chinese_mnemonics_deck__story: To describe something, like the growth process of a seedling, use your fingers to sketch something on a white board or even in the sand.
humanum_full_description_en: From the sound of " hand " and " miao ", it means drawing and copying. Tang Bai Juyi's "Little Boy Xue Yang Tao Blowing Songs": "The slow-sounding exhibition draws length and order, and the order is as straight as a pen.
humanum_short_description_en: From the sound of " hand " and " miao ", it means drawing and copying.
humanum_full_description: 從「手」，「苗」聲，表示描畫、摹寫。唐白居易〈小童薛陽陶吹觱篥歌〉：「緩聲展引長有條，有條直直如筆描。」
humanum_short_description: 從「手」，「苗」聲，表示描畫、摹寫。

描字的基本解释

描
miáo
依照原样摹画或重复地画：描写。描叙。描述。描红。描画。描状。描摹。

描字的汉语字典释义

[①]［miáo］
［《廣韻》武儦切，平宵，明。］
(1)描画；摹写。
(2)方言。交代，点明。

描字的英文翻译

◎ 描
draw, paint

描字的康熙字典解释

【卯集中】【手字部】　描； 康熙笔画：13； 页码：页441第17
【唐韻】武鑣切【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】眉鑣切，?音苗。摹畫也。【六書故】描摹聲相近，描輕而摹重。又【唐韻】莫交切【集韻】謨交切，?音茅。打也。　又【集韻】眉敎切，音貌。擲也。

描字的源字形

描字的起名意思

依样摹写或绘画。

Пиктофонетические символы.
(Рука) идеограмма, ее древние символы напоминают человеческую руку, что означает, что рука держит перо для рисования; Мяо (мидо) означает, что слово молодое, что означает, что описание обычно представляет собой небольшой штрих или маленький штрих .
Первоначальный смысл - рисовать.

miáo
I гл.
1) рисовать (с натуры); копировать, списывать
描容(家) писать портрет
2) обводить (контуры); подрисовывать; выводить (иероглифы)
描红模子 писать по красным иероглифам (учась каллиграфии)
描眉打鬓 подводить брови и укладывать волосы
3) описывать, отображать
描情 описывать чувства, отображать эмоции
4) вм. 瞄 (целиться)
II сущ.
линии (письма, рисунка)
铁线描 жёсткие линии (манера живописи, каллиграфии)
Radicals: 扌, 艹, 田  (fingers, flowers, rice-paddy)
Meaning Mnemonic
When you see flowers in a rice paddy you can't help but use your fingers to draw them. Have you ever seen rice paddy flowers? They're beautiful. And if you can draw them you can capture that beauty and show it to everyone.
Imagine using your fingers to draw these rice paddy flowers. Don't worry about how well you can draw, this is so beautiful, anyone could capture it.
Reading Mnemonic
Even though you tried to draw the flowers as best you could, whenever someone looks at it they smell B.O. (びょう). Maybe it's because you were drawing for a really long time and kept sweating. Maybe it's because you are just a stinky person. But no one wants to look at your drawing for long because all they can smell is B.O.
To be fair, would you want to look at a drawing that makes you constantly smell stinky B.O.? I didn't think so.
